description: Connection churn, long-lived streams, header stress, and memory ceilings.
TLS and relay fault-injection behavior validation.
Adversarial parser and fuzz-regression stress suite.
Toxiproxy and tc netem tooling and live network fault probes.
Differential behavior parity checks versus mitmproxy fixtures.
External benchmark/load/tooling lane matrix (wrk/hey/h2load/ghz/etc).
TLS hardening benchmark/probe lane.
Phase-5 reliability invariants: flow FSM validator, single-close guardrail, runtime budgets, idle watchdog, and H2 stage-timeout telemetry.
HTTP/1 canonicalization and smuggling-guard fixture corpus plus deterministic runtime rejection checks.
TLS strict|default|compat profile matrix, cert-profile fixture checks, and openssl/badssl probes.
Route planner/config matrix for direct|reverse|upstream-http|upstream-socks5 plus chained host allow/ignore semantics.
HTTP/2 stream lifecycle resilience (parallel stress, reset/GOAWAY tolerance, header limits) plus mandatory h2spec blocking criteria command.
Deterministic event log v2 contract (stable serialization, replay diff fixtures, and machine-readable sidecar exit status).
Per-host compatibility overrides (`force_tunnel`, `disable_h2`, strict-header intent, `skip_upstream_verify`) with decision provenance checks.
IPv6/dual-stack listener and socket lifecycle guards with runtime pressure instrumentation checks.
Conditional control-plane boundary guard lane asserting no exposed management/control endpoint surface.
Long-running mixed-traffic soak gate for runtime budget envelope.
Integrated reliability gate carrying forward Phase-5 contract, HTTP/2 resilience, runtime soak, and deterministic mixed-traffic close semantics.
TLS revocation metadata matrix and diagnostics stability checks.
Optional/required upstream mTLS behavior matrix with deterministic fallback checks.
Phase-6 perf harness for forwarding latency, TLS handshake overhead, SSE first-chunk delta, and 1k connection-scale baseline.
Phase-6 acceptance criteria matrix (AC-01..AC-17) with per-AC artifacts and strict-mode gating.
Phase-6 publish and cutover readiness checks: publish dry-run, integration compile smoke, and cutover checklist status.
